Replacement.Comment: replace tabs et al with regular spaces
rm unnecessary whitespace in link markup: unpiped links
rm unnecessary whitespace in link markup: piped links
collapse spaces (except in template parameters or gallery entries)
start templates on a new line, except for {{Ruby}}
rm leading/trailing whitespace (except after equals signs or single pipes)
move closing }} in multiline templates to a separate line
rm unnecessary leading : from link markup
fix double equals signs on parameters (sometimes, at least)
change newlines that aren't empty and don't start a new template call or parameter to

remove
at the beginning of parameters (can sometimes happen when the above rule fires)

Replacement.Comment: move "(s)" out of link markup of piped links
delink duplicates of the same link in the same line: duplicate is unpiped
delink duplicates of the same link in the same line: duplicate is piped

IRule.Name: underscores to spaces in link markup

Summaries.string: Fixing [[Wikipedia:Disambiguation pages with links|links to disambiguation pages]]

update parameter names, standard spacing on parameters
fix Italian Labyrinth of Nightmare set abbreviation (LDH → LDI)
fix Italian Labyrinth of Nightmare set abbreviation (LON → LDI)
fix Italian Labyrinth of Nightmare set abbreviation (LDI-IT → LDI-I)
remove nonexistent print PGL2 Unlimited Edition
use {{card_type}}} instead of {{{type}}} for non-game stuff
update status parameter names/rm unneeded status parameters
rm parameters for various video games that have been split out
